attributes.action: Introduce a new body that will set civil servant's pay, including that of MPs.
attributes.background: On 16/07/15, the Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) announced an increase in MPs pay from £67,060 to £74,000 backdated to 8th May 2015. This represents an increase of £6,940 or 10.348% at a time when public sector pay increase has been frozen at 1%. This appears unfair.
